text: John Bertrand Conlan (September 17, 1930 - June 18, 2021) was an American lawyer and Republican politician. He served as a State Senator from 1965 to 1972 and as a United States Representative from Arizona from 1973 to 1977. Conlon served in the Arizona Senate from 1967 to 1973.Arizona State Library- Arizona Legislators Past and Present Conlon died on June 18, 2021 in Asheville, North Carolina at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:United States representatives from Arizona Category:Politicians from Oak Park, Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John Bertrand Conlan
